Title: Population genomic and genome-wide association studies of agroclimatic traits in sorghum
Abstract: Here are the data that have been analyzed in Lozano et al. 2012. The maize data were originally published in Lipka et al. (2013) (https://doi.org/10.1534/g3.113.006148), and the sorghum data were orginally publisehd in Morris et al. (2013) (https://doi.org/10.1073/pnas.121598511)
